articles.author: Bill Toulas
articles.title: Malicious Chrome extensions with 75M installs removed from Web Store - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Google has removed from the Chrome Web Store 32 malicious extensions that could alter search results and push spam or unwanted ads. Collectively, they come with a download count of 75 million.
